review: ****** ** ***** ******* ****** *** ******** ****************** *** ***************** *** ***** *** ** ******** *** ******* **** **** *** ******* ******* ** *I went to consult for knee enjury (meniscus tear).first day he told me ,get the MRI ,if there is small tear we can take the help of plaster or anything else without any surgery .I went there with MRI , it had clearly written in report that tear is small and there is no other complications.he saw the report and in the first look he said surgery is the only option .i was shocked. then he asked for insurance .I have insurance but I said I don't have. after that he was saying if you are working, 99% of chance that you will have insurance ask to HR team. after that i asked the surgery cost *** **** ********* ****** * ******Another thing consultation charge was 800 rupees, next day they charged 300 for follow up charge. ****** ** *** ****** ** **** ************ ** **** **** ******* ******* **** ** *** **** *** ****** ** ** *** *********** ******* ** **** *** ********* *** ** *** ****** * ******* ********** *************** ****** ********* * ******* **** * *** *** *** ****** ********* ****** **** ******* ** *** ********** ******* ******* ****** ** **** *** **** ****** ** **** * ** **** ** ****** *** *** ******* ******* ***** ******* ***** ***** ******* **** **** ***** ****** ***** **** *****
